text.title: Belov Roman
text.description:
I have been doing frontend development since 2019. I live and work in Moscow.
For several years of training and work in the field of web development, I managed to gain a multifaceted experience in more than 3 companies.

On this site you can find more information about me, my projects, as well as the technology stack that I work with.
